trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> tab group that dynamically displays controls that are only relevant in a particular context.
You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context.
Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria.
For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the content of the contextual tab group header.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The content of the contextual tab group header.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the format that is used to display the header content as a string.
The HeaderStringFormat property is only used when there is no header template.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
The format that is used to display the header content as a string.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderStringFormat*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display the contents of the header.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A template that specifies the visualization of the header.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the custom logic for selecting a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is used to display the contents of the header.
You use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property to specify the visualization of the header.
If you have more than one template defined and want to specify logic that selects a template to use, then you use this property.
This property is ignored if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A custom <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataTemplateSelector"></xref> object that provides logic and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref>.
The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.HeaderTemplateSelector*> dependency property.
To be added.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonContextualTabGroupAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
A new automation peer object for this control.
Called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property changes.
The old value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property.
The new value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Header*> property.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseDown"></xref> routed event.
This method captures the mouse when a single-click occurs on the contextual tab group.
It minimizes or maximizes the window when a double-click occurs.

This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp"></xref> routed event and releases the mouse.
This method releases the mouse capture and sends click notifications to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseUp> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
The event data.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
This property is used to access visual style brushes defined on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> class.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A reference to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that this control belongs to.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonContextualTabGroup.Ribbon*> dependency property.
To be added.
